name: White Haze
description: White Haze, the winning sativa of the 2002 Cannabis Cup, is a variation on the classic Haze strain from the Dutch White Label Seed Company, a Sensi Seeds sister company. The already sizeable trichome production is boosted, while reducing the height and flowering time of the famously tall original Hazes. The power of sativa and indica are both strongly expressed in the flower formation and effects. Its lightweight, lofty buzz is counterbalanced by a comfortable relaxation that spans both mind and body. White Haze grows running sativa colas that are given density by the indica influence.
descriptionPlain: White Haze, the winning sativa of the 2002 Cannabis Cup, is a variation on the classic Haze strain from the Dutch White Label Seed Company, a Sensi Seeds sister company. The already sizeable trichome production is boosted, while reducing the height and flowering time of the famously tall original Hazes. The power of sativa and indica are both strongly expressed in the flower formation and effects. Its lightweight, lofty buzz is counterbalanced by a comfortable relaxation that spans both mind and body. White Haze grows running sativa colas that are given density by the indica influence.

highlightedReviews.text:
White Haze is a pretty light smoke. The taste is kinda pine and earthy, with a nice addition of lemon flavor. something I prefer a lot.

At first comes a nice and warm body-buzz, followed by an euphoric head-high. The mind stays also focused and feels more awake.


The chilled body-buzz together with the focused and happy head-high make it a good Netflix or Chill After Workout - Strain.
Overall the effects of White Haze are very enjoyable, but there are plenty of other strains which can do at least as good.

My Rating: 4
Definitely recommend for a daytime high

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Kill Bill, Viper, California Grapefruit, Tokyo OG, and White Haze
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
It's Friday, which means it's time to kick off the weekend with some tempting new strains! This week, we've got some vicious new varieties like Kill Bill and Viper, as well as the flavorful California Grapefruit, the energizing White Haze, and the potent Tokyo OG. You suggested them, and now it's time to complete these strains with your review. Be sure to also check out which of these strains are available near you by navigating to their strain pages and clicking "Availability." You just might discover a new favorite!
   1. Kill Bill
Characteristics of Kill Bill:

Hybrid strain
Cross between Killer Queen and Willy's Wonder
Breeder: Reservoir Seeds
Skunky, pine aroma
Cerebral energy coupled with full-body relaxation
May help patients treating stress, pain, and appetite loss
Indoor flowering time of 7 to 8 weeks

   2. Viper
Characteristics of Viper:

95% sativa
Cross between Burmese and Mexican landrace strains
Breeder: Reeferman Seeds
Spicy, citrus aroma
Buzzing, active cerebral effects
Indoor flowering time of 10 weeks

   3. California Grapefruit
Characteristics of California Grapefruit:

Mostly indica
Cross between Northern Lights, Skunk #1, and Afghani
Breeder: DNA Genetics
Sweet, earthy, grapefruit aroma
Heavily relaxing with slow onset
May help patients treating pain, insomnia, and muscle tension
Indoor flowering time of 52 to 63 days

   4. Tokyo OG
Characteristics of Tokyo OG:

Hybrid strain
OG Kush phenotype
Lemon, pine, and diesel aroma
Relaxing indica effects
May help patients treating anxiety, stress, and pain

   5. White Haze
Characteristics of White Haze:

70/30 sativa-dominant strain
Haze hybrid
Breeder: Sensi Seeds
Spicy aroma
Lightweight, lofty buzz balanced by comfortable relaxation
Indoor flowering time of 60 days
